mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_judge_status (id, username, problem_id, contest_id, language, submit_time, result, score, time_used, memory_used, code, code_length ) VALUES (#{judgeStatusPO.id}, #{judgeStatusPO.username}, #{judgeStatusPO.problemId}, #{judgeStatusPO.contestId}, #{judgeStatusPO.language}, #{judgeStatusPO.submitTime}, #{judgeStatusPO.result}, #{judgeStatusPO.score}, #{judgeStatusPO.timeUsed}, #{judgeStatusPO.memoryUsed}, #{judgeStatusPO.code}, #{judgeStatusPO.codeLength} );
mapper.update: UPDATE t_judge_status SET result = #{judgeStatusPO.result}, score = #{judgeStatusPO.score}, time_used = #{judgeStatusPO.timeUsed} , memory_used = #{judgeStatusPO.memoryUsed} WHERE id = #{judgeStatusPO.id} ;
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) totalCount, SUM(result=1) acCount, DATE(submit_time) submitDay FROM t_judge_status WHERE submit_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) GROUP BY DATE(submit_time);
